name: spo-pin-field-filterpane
title: Pins Fields to the Filter Pane in SharePoint Libraries
shortDescription: Pinning Fields to the Filter Pane in SharePoint Libraries.
longDescription: The filter pane allows users to quickly filter and find relevant data in libraries and lists. However, by default, not all fields are visible in the filter pane. To enhance usability, specific fields can be pinned to the top of the filter pane.
